text: @realDonaldTrump U see Donald Trump God knows how to save the best for last when he know the wicked so now your nerves are more so on edge as 5 people tested positive for the coronavirus@ the White House. God is truly dealing with you and your not getting it yet. Nobody demon is in controlbutGod.
